tool_description: Get the user's IP address and all geolocation information in 8 languages
name: GeoIP
title: GeoIP

api_list.name: Get IP and all location data
api_list.description: Get user IP and all geolocation info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geoip18.p.rapidapi.com/ip/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoip18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geoip18.p.rapidapi.com/ip/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geoip18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
